net.digger.protocol.xymodem

Interface IOHandler


  • public interface IOHandler
    Interface for handling various events during a download.
    Author:
    walton

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void log(java.lang.String message)
      Called during download with logging messages.
      void progress(long bytes, long total)
      Called during download with progress data.
      java.lang.Byte read(int msTimeout)
      Called during download to read the next input byte.
      void received(Download download)
      Called at end of successful download with details of downloaded file.
      void write(char ch)
      Called during download to send a byte to the sender.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        java.lang.Byte read(int msTimeout)
             throws UserCancelException
        Called during download to read the next input byte.

        Blocks until the next byte is available. If timeout is reached, return null. If user cancels the download while blocked, throw DownloadCancelException.

        Parameters:
        msTimeout - Milliseconds to wait before timing out.
        Returns:
        Next data byte, or null if timed out.
        Throws:
        UserCancelException - If user cancelled the download.

      • write

        void write(char ch)
        Called during download to send a byte to the sender.
        Parameters:
        ch - Byte to transmit.

      • log

        void log(java.lang.String message)
        Called during download with logging messages.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to log.

      • progress

        void progress(long bytes,
              long total)
        Called during download with progress data.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Number of bytes downloaded so far.
        total - Total size of file being downloaded (0 if unknown).

      • received

        void received(Download download)
        Called at end of successful download with details of downloaded file.
        Parameters:
        download - Download object with details of downloaded file, including a reference to it.
